parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description: The end time for the query. The time follows the ISO 8601 standard and UTC time is used. Format: YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ.

parameters.name: GroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the API group.

parameters.name: StageName
parameters.description:
The environment to which the APIs in the API group are published. Valid values:

*   **RELEASE**: the production environment
*   **PRE**: the staging environment
*   **TEST**: the test environment

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description: The start time for the query. The time follows the ISO 8601 standard and UTC time is used. Format: YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ.
